Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a simple device, like a string telephone, that allows people to communicate over a long distance.
The student can show how the device uses sound to send or receive information.
The student can use the provided materials in their drawing to accurately depict the design of the device.
The student can include key features that their device effectively allows communication between two students.
The student can indicate how their device helps solve the problem of communicating over a distance in their drawing.
